style.css:
/* ==UserStyle==
@name football.ua - dark mode
@version 0.1.0
@description Dark css theme for football.ua
@author Oleksii Garkavenko
@supportUrl https://t.me/kosmeech
@license CC0-1.0
==/UserStyle== */

@-moz-document domain("football.ua") {
/* =============== BACKGROUND ============================== */
body,
.article-text table th,
.left-menu .inner-list li a:hover,
.left-menu .inner-list li.selected a,
.left-menu,
.header-wrap,
.channels-block,
.tv-days .day.ui-state-hover,
.tv-days .day.ui-state-active,
.tournament-table .date,
.premier-league th,
.player-statistic-table th,
.main-article .text.current,
.right-gallery .bx-pager .bx-pager-item a.active,
body > .ui-datepicker,
.statistic-table th,
.statistic-table th.name span,
.big-intro .intro,
.road,
footer p,
.main-tournament-table th,
.match-info-table th,
.trophies h3,
.players-table th,
.no-blogs .add-blog,
.cabinet .user .user-text .c-link,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-titlebar {
    background: #1b1b1b!important;
}

.page,
.container,
.conference .question-block,
.header-search input,
.search-results .search-block,
.edit-block h3,
.feed-table td,
.feed-table th,
.left-menu li a,
.footer-links,
.footer-nav,
.right-gallery .bx-pager .bx-pager-item a,
.right-gallery .bx-pager,
.left-menu .menu-separator,
.match-center .match-date,
.goals-table th,
.jselect .jselect-title,
.jselect .jselect-li,
.matches,
.match-details-teams .score span,
.statistic-table tr:nth-child(odd) td,
.main-tournament-table tr:nth-child(odd) td,
.player-statistic-table tr:nth-child(odd) td,
.time-articles a,
.article-text p,
.article-text table tr:nth-child(odd) td,
.subject-tags h3:after,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content .edit-form,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content .ui-dialog-buttonpane,
.profile h3,
.no-blogs,
.ui-dialog .ui-dialog-content {
    background: #444!important;
}

.author-article .article-author,
.conference .question-search .question-input,
.edit-form .label .form-input,
.edit-form .label textarea,
.profile-edit .form-buttons .cancel,
.players-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.statistic-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.main-tournament-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.consist-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.tournament-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.feed-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.match-center-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.player-statistic-table tr:nth-child(even) td,
.input-group > .form-control:not(:last-child),
.input-group > .custom-select:not(:last-child),
.page-link,
.select-block .selectboxit-options,
.pagination a,
#UserNotification {
    background: #555!important;
}

.add-comment .comment-textarea,
.comment_form textarea,
.f-dropdown .dropdown-menu-umh LI > A, 
.f-dropdown .dropdown-menu-umh LABEL,
.f-dropdown .dropdown-menu-umh, 
.f-dropdown .dropdown-panel,
.reply_text,
.search-results .search-block input,
.modal-body,
.modal-header,
.modal-footer,
.icon-default {
    background: #7a7a7a!important;
}


.tournaments-table .bx-next,
.author-materials .bx-next,
.right-gallery .bx-next,
.page-next,
.subject-switcher .bx-next {
    background: #1b1b1b url(https://football.ua/tpl/football/img/icons/arrow-right.png) no-repeat center;
}
.tournaments-table .bx-prev,
.author-materials .bx-prev,
.right-gallery .bx-prev,
.page-prev,
.subject-switcher .bx-prev {
    background: #1b1b1b url(https://football.ua/tpl/football/img/icons/arrow-left.png) no-repeat center;
}
.match-center-table .more-button .match-link {
    background: #444 url(https://football.ua/tpl/football/img/icons/match1.png) center no-repeat;
    border-bottom: 0.5px solid #eeeeee;
}
.match.active .match-center-table .more-button .match-link {
    background: #1b1b1b url(https://football.ua/tpl/football/img/icons/match3.png) center no-repeat;
}
.main-right .banner {
    border: 5px solid #444;
}
.archive-list li.authors {
    background: #444;
    border-left: 0;
    padding-right: 0;
    padding-left: 0;
}
.gallery h1 {
    border-bottom: 0;
    padding-bottom: 0;
}

.feed-table .score.inprogress {
    background: #b23022;
    color: #eeeeee;
}

.search-results .search-block {
    border: 0;
    border-top: none;
    padding: 15;
}


/* ======================= FONTS ========================== */
a,
body,
.feed-table td,
.add-comment .comment-textarea,
.author-article h1,
.author-article h2,
.f-dropdown .dropdown-menu-umh LI > A, 
.f-dropdown .dropdown-menu-umh LABEL,
.header-search input,
.tv-match h4,
.tv-match .time,
.show-channels,
.tournament-table,
.tournament-table td,
.player-statistic-table td,
.author-article a,
.comment-display li a,
.comment-display li a.active,
.left-menu .inner-list li.selected a,
.statistic-table td,
.matches_date,
.m_command_name,
.m_command_points,
.matches_time,
.match-info-table th,
.statistic_table a,
.news_feed_time,
.news_feed_title,
.article a,
.news-line h3,
.swiper-slide a .team-name,
.swiper-slide a .team-goals,
.modal-title,
.input-group > .form-control:not(:last-child),
.input-group > .custom-select:not(:last-child),
*,
*::before,
*::after,
.comment-list .comment p,
.title,
.gallery h1,
.profile h3,
.page-link,
.pagination a {
    color: #eeeeee!important;
}

.main-article .text p,
.actual p,
.author-article .date,
.author-article .rubric,
.left-menu .inner-list li a,
.tv-match .text,
.tv-programm .programm-list .description,
.tv-programm .programm-list .date,
.gallery-list .date,
.feed-table th p,
.checkbox,
.bottom-info h4,
.comment-item .date,
.comment-item .user span,
.hide-comments,
.comment-item .date a,
.comment-item .answer,
.comment-item .quoted,
.add-comment .symbols,
.news_feed_date,
.archive-list li .date,
.archive-list li .type,
.read-also .date,
.news-feed .news-date,
.news-feed li a:visited,
.subject-switcher .date,
.cabinet .user .user-text .user-table td:first-child,
.profile .profile-info-table td:first-child,
.search-results .result-block p,
.gallery .date {
    color: #999!important;
}


.article-text h3.feed-header,
.comment-item .like-counter,
.comment-list .like .like-counter,
.feed-header,
.nav-tabs .nav-link.active {
    color: #000!important;
}

.news-feed .important-time {
    color: #d7420c!important;
}
  
}
